fb344e3f-d205-461e-b393-de3e515d1afe.description: The Inventory Specialty Certification focuses on the activities associated with identifying and tracking fixed and mobile assets; including endpoint devices and infrastructure, and associating assets with assigned users, cost elements, and configuration attributes. fe394a83-1f27-46c9-a6e2-401221d0d8e4.description: This badge is awarded to AOTMP® University at AOTMP® 2019 conference attendees who completed three (3) of the following courses in each of the following tracks listed below. This is a one-time issuance and is worth three (3) AOTMP® University credit hours.
fe394a83-1f27-46c9-a6e2-401221d0d8e4.name: AOTMP® University at AOTMP® 2019 Coursework Completed

badge_template_activities.title: One (1) Fundamentals Course: What Your Telecom Inventory Says About Your Organization, 10 Tips to Improve Contract Negotiation Performance, or Vendor Management Practices Every Telecom / Mobility / IT Management Practitioner Needs to Know,

One (1) Advanced Course: Building Impact Scorecards that Encourage Positive Vendor Performance, Inventory Validation Techniques that Improve Accuracy, or Building a Business Case: Enterprise Mobility Management.

One (1) Strategies & New Technologies Course: It’s Time to Update Your Telecom Technology: SD-WAN and UC, The IoT and Me: How to Make the Most of an IoT Deployment, or Maturing Inventory to be the Single Source of Truth in Your Telecom / Mobility / IT Management Practice.

One (1) Innovators Course: Best Practices for Measuring Performance: It’s All About the Data (and Analytics), A Risky Business: Understanding and Mitigating Your Data Privacy Risks, or 7 Leading Best Practices: Global Telecom / Mobility / IT Management.

408773b9-8d74-4948-b9fc-158b80349490.description: AOTMP® Master Certification verifies candidates understand Efficiency First® Framework best practices and Center of Excellence principles and they can apply this knowledge to build and maintain and Center of Excellence (CoE). AOTMP® Master Certified professionals have a comprehensive understanding of each stage of Efficiency First® Framework adoption and how to navigate and implement requirements in each stage. Earned certification credentials are valid for 24 months.
408773b9-8d74-4948-b9fc-158b80349490.name: Master Certified

badge_template_activities.title: • This exam contains 75 questions that must be completed in a single session. • This exam is timed and must be completed within 90 minutes. • A passing score of ≥80% is required to earn certification.
